name: Installation Check
title: Installation Check
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TS/pages/1055129601 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Process for removing installations
      • Installation check message
        • Type of message
        • What does it mean/refer to?
        • Mirror server
        • How can it be fixed?

Process for removing installations

Installation check message

Type of message

What does it mean/refer to?

Mirror server

How can it be fixed?

Unable to Connect to tcp://proxy:8080. Error #0: php_network_getaddresses: getaddrinfo failed: Name or service not known

Error

  • Possible DNS error


  • Check if there are other installation check messages regarding domains that can not be resolved

  • In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins

Error: The server cannot look up its own domain name. Please make sure the server can resolve at least [URL]

Error

  • Possible DNS error

  • or a redirect is in place for that domain

  • or a maintenance page is set for this installation/domain(you might not see the maintenance page from within our network)


  • Check if there are other installation check messages regarding domains that can not be resolved

  • Via a console check what the domain name resolves to respectively if there is a redirect

  • host [domain name]

  • In case of DNS errors contact Sysadmins

  • Check the domain from externally. Is a maintenance page shown? If yes:

  • Is a maintenance planned? Check again after the maintenance is finished.

  • If no maintenance is planned, maybe the maintenance page hasn’t been removed

  • and still is there in error. Contact Sysadmins.

Error: Cannot connect to SFTP host 'mysight-data.bre.globalpark.com': Couldn't read packet: Connection reset by peer

Error

Possible DNS error.

Also could mean that the installation can not connect to external domains (e.g. on mirror installations)


  • Check if there are other installation check messages regarding domains that can not be resolved

  • In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

  • Check (with Sysadmins ) if the installation should be able to connect to external domains (productive servers should be able to do so, local machines like mirror installation not. Procus and testkanal installations usually access alternative domains on testkanal). If installation can not connect to external domains, you can ignore this. If it can/should, make sure the entered URL is correct and reachable, contact Sysadmins to check connectivity.

Error: Cannot connect to rabbitmq-host - php_network_getaddresses: getaddrinfo failed: Name or service not known

Error

Possible DNS error.

Also could mean that the installation can not connect to external domains (e.g. on mirror installations)

no host is entered on purpose so that no messages are retrieved from rabbitmq from the live installation. You can ignore this on mirror installations

  • Check if there are other installation check messages regarding domains that can not be resolved

  • In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

  • Check (with Sysadmins ) if the installation should be able to connect to external domains (productive servers should be able to do so, local machines like mirror installation not. Procus and testkanal installations usually access alternative domains on testkanal). If installation can not connect to external domains, you can ignore this. If it can/should, make sure the entered URL is correct and reachable, contact Sysadmins to check connectivity.

Error: The configuration is missing the apache rewrite rule necessary for the panel. If the rewrite rule is present make sure the server can resolve [URL]. The panel website won't work.

Error

  • Possible DNS error.

  • or a maintenance page is set for this installation (you might not see the maintenance page from within our network)


  • Check if there are other installation check messages regarding domains that can not be resolved

  • Via a console check what the domain name resolves to respectively if there is a redirect

  • host [domain name]

  • In case of DNS errors contact Sysadmins

  • Check the domain from externally. Is a maintenance page shown? If yes:

  • Is a maintenance planned? Check again after the maintenance is finished.

  • If no maintenance is planned, maybe the maintenance page hasn’t been removed

  • and still is there in error. Contact Sysadmins.

Error: Unable to connect to Elasticsearch. Please check config settings.

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Check elastic search host in config. Procus and Testkanal use an alternaive domain. Make sure there is an index for the installation in elastic search (check elastic search paper page/twiki for info) and if needed, create it anew (in case of cloned installations).

Error: Reporting wordcloud feature enabled but the text analyser service is not working correctly: Text-Analyzer Client Exception:Curl Error: Couldn't resolve host 'text-analyzer'

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: Reporting PPT Export could not fetch version from Service. Expected version is 2.0.0.*. Error was: SOAP-ERROR: Parsing WSDL: Couldn't load from 'https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl' : failed to load external entity "https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl"

(0)

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: Reporting XLS Export is configured but the service doesn't work for reporting_template_1_5.xls. Error was: SOAP-ERROR: Parsing WSDL: Couldn't load from 'https://rp.questback.com/XlsPlus/XlsService.asmx?wsdl' : failed to load external entity "https://rp.questback.com/XlsPlus/XlsService.asmx?wsdl"

(666)

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: Reporting PPT Export was configured but the service doesn't work for reporting_template.ppt. Error was: SOAP-ERROR: Parsing WSDL: Couldn't load from 'https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl' : failed to load external entity "https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl"

(666)

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: Reporting PPT Export was configured but the service doesn't work for reporting_template_blank.ppt. Error was: SOAP-ERROR: Parsing WSDL: Couldn't load from 'https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl' : failed to load external entity "https://rp.questback.com/PptPlus/PptService.asmx?wsdl"

(666)

Error

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: Reporting PPT Export was configured but the service doesn't work for reporting_template.ppt. Error was: .NET Service returned no binary data. (1)

Error



SB: The error came up temporarily. I can’t say what the reason was. It had disappeared when I wanted to further check it so I wan’t able to further analyze it.

Error: Reporting PPT Export was configured but the service doesn't work for reporting_template_blank.ppt. Error was: .NET Service returned no binary data. (1)

Error



SB: The error came up temporarily. I can’t say what the reason was. It had disappeared when I wanted to further check it so I wan’t able to further analyze it.

Warning: URL service on http://i.gpefs.com/shorturl/?url=xxx is not available on port 80.

Warning

Possible DNS error, check if there are other messages regarding domains that can not be resolved.


In case of DNS error contact Sysadmins.

Error: SnailMail cron job did not run in the last 15 minutes

Error


Can all be ignored because cron jobs are not running on mirror installations

  • Check if still running (then its locked - see table ‘db_locks’)

  • If not try start manually

  • If it cant be executed ask SA it its locked otherwise or if crons are not activated

  • If errors (PHP etc.) occur while executing do further analysis

Error: jobmaker cron job did not run in the last 25 minutes

Error


Can all be ignored because cron jobs are not running on mirror installations

  • Check if still running (then its locked - see table ‘db_locks’)

  • If not try start manually

  • If it cant be executed ask SA it its locked otherwise or if crons are not activated

  • If errors (PHP etc.) occur while executing do further analysis

Error: dbreportstamp cron job did not run in the last 25 hours

Error


Can all be ignored because cron jobs are not running on mirror installations

  • Check if still running (then its locked - see table ‘db_locks’)

  • If not try start manually

  • If it cant be executed ask SA it its locked otherwise or if crons are not activated

  • If errors (PHP etc.) occur while executing do further analysis

Error: Missing stream transport support in PHP. The following transports are missing: sslv2

Error




Error: Your pdflib licence does not seem to be valid: Your client is unknown!

Error



If the OSM module is activated but no pdflib licence key is in place. In case of productive installation add key

https://it.globalpark.de/twiki/bin/view/Support/SupportEFSHybridExtension

Error: could not connect to any memcache server

Error



Check config and add the correct memcache server (Frankfurt and Rackspace are different). If server is correct forward to SA.

Error: Response error from MySight dataflow pipeline at 'http://10.4.0.101:49866/app/api/process/userprovision/': Internal Server Error

Error




Warning:The configuration is missing the installation ID (__gp_id). This may cause errors in order to create a DB-Report.

Warning


Mirror installations do not have a gp_id (Globis ID). You can ignore this message on mirror installations


Warning: skipping result test: memcache is not active

Warning




Warning: Access to service domain new-york.globalpark.de is not available via fsockopen on port 443. Certain EFS features (e.g. feed subscriptions) will not work.

Warning




Error: The panel templates directory (/nfs/opst3/support01-tka.qb-feedback.com/htdocs/conf/../panelwebsite/__templates/68) for site 'english' is not writable. You may not add new panel templates.

Error




Warning: Please consider if file/s

/nfs/opst3/support01-tka.qb-feedback.com/htdocs/conf/../panelwebsite/__templates/34/js_default.tpl

should be deleted.

Warning




Warning: Relevantid module is active but no relevantid_auth value is set in configuration.

Warning




Error: SFTP private-key file doesn't exist at '/nfs/opst/qr4773-pc.qb-feedback.com/htdocs/conf/../../privatedocs/EFSsftp_private'.

Error



  • If MySight v1 is not active it cant be ignored

  • If MySight v1 is active check if key exist at the given path and if the rights are correct

  • -r-------- 1 nfsnobody nfsnobody

  • If key does not exist at the given path and or if the rights are not correct forward to SA

Error: SFTP private-key file '/nfs/opst/[domain]/htdocs/conf/../../privatedocs/EFSsftp_private' isn't readable, try again as user nobody.



The installation check does not run the check as user nobody but the file only is readable by user nobody. You can ignore this error message.


Error: Wrong MySQL version. This may cause serious problems. Please inform de.support@questback.com immediately. Installed: 10.1.20-MariaDB. Expected: 5.1.3x

Error


Can be ignored on mirror installation. There we actually seem to use maria DB


Error: Value for config variable 'tmp_path_export' is not specified.

Error


The path does not have to be defined on mirror installation and can be left blank. You can ignore this message or just add the tmp path here as well so that the message disappears


Error: Watchdog directory '/opst_temp2/watchdog/' is not writeable for the web server. Please fix the directory privileges.

Error

This errors occurs if the file rights or user/group for the files are not set correctly.

user/group have to be nfsnobody/nfsnobody and file rights have to be folders: 775, files: 664.

Ask sysadmins to set the right file rights

Error: The directory used for storing private files ($__basepath_private_files) is not writable. Please fix this.

Error

This errors occurs if the file rights or user/group for the files are not set correctly.

user/group have to be nfsnobody/nfsnobody and file rights have to be folders: 775, files: 664.

Ask sysadmins to set the right file rights

Error: uc directory is not writable.

Error

This errors occurs if the file rights or user/group for the files This errors occurs if the file rights or user/group for the files are not set correctly.are not set correctly.

user/group have to be nfsnobody/nfsnobody and file rights have to be folders: 775, files: 664.

This errors occurs if the file rights or user/group for the files are not set correctly.

user/group have to be nfsnobody/nfsnobody and file rights have to be folders: 775, files: 664.

user/group have to be nfsnobody/nfsnobody and file rights have to be folders: 775, files: 664.
